Package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.config

Interface ApiConfig

All Superinterfaces:
org.aeonbits.owner.Config, io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.PropertyConfig, Serializable
@LoadPolicy(MERGE) @Sources({"system:properties","classpath:${api.config.file}.properties"}) public interface ApiConfig extends io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.PropertyConfig
Configuration interface for API-related settings.

This interface utilizes the Owner library to load API configurations from system properties or a specified properties file. It supports customizable settings for logging, API base URLs, and more.

Configuration sources:

  • System properties
  • Classpath properties file (defined via api.config.file)

  • Method Details

    • projectPackages

      @Key("project.packages") @Separator(";") String[] projectPackages()
      Retrieves the base package of the project for class scanning.
      Returns:
      The base package name defined in the configuration.

    • restAssuredLoggingEnabled

      @DefaultValue("true") @Key("api.restassured.logging.enabled") boolean restAssuredLoggingEnabled()
      Determines whether RestAssured request/response logging is enabled.

      Default: true

      Returns:
      true if logging is enabled, false otherwise.

    • restAssuredLoggingLevel

      @DefaultValue("ALL") @Key("api.restassured.logging.level") String restAssuredLoggingLevel()
      Specifies the logging level for RestAssured.

      Default: "ALL"

      Returns:
      The logging level as a string (e.g., "ALL", "BASIC", "NONE").

    • baseUrl

      @Key("api.base.url") String baseUrl()
      Retrieves the base URL for API requests.
      Returns:
      The API base URL.

    • logFullBody

      @DefaultValue("true") @Key("log.full.body") boolean logFullBody()
      Determines whether the full response body should be logged.

      If set to true, the entire response body will be logged. If false, the response body will be truncated based on the shorten.body configuration.

      Default: true

      Returns:
      true if full response body logging is enabled, false otherwise.

    • shortenBody

      @DefaultValue("1000") @Key("shorten.body") int shortenBody()
      Specifies the maximum number of characters to display when logging a response body.

      If log.full.body is set to false, response bodies longer than this value will be truncated with an ellipsis (...).

      Default: 1000

      Returns:
      The maximum number of characters to display in a logged response body.
